resources.string: This keyboard has been developed by the Aḷiyakaṭṭụ Tuḷuva Saṅgha (ATS) in collaboration with the Indigenous Animist Society (IAS). It has been conceived to accommodate the Tuḷu alphabet system with QWERTY - based ergonomics to aid ease of use and make typing Tuḷu much more accurate and simplified. The ATS Tulu keyboard allows one to type Tuḷu or Korrè exactly as one speaks their respective dialect of these two languages, thus aiding in the preservation of diverse ancient indigenous pronunciations and accents present in various region-specific Tuḷu and Korrè dialects extant across Tulu Nāḍụ state. The ATS Tulu keyboard can be used for typing Tulu as well as Tulu\'s sister languages such as Korrè (Koraga language), Kuḍiya (Maḻè Kuḍiya language), Mārkoḍi (Māvilan language) and to some extent, Bellāri (Bellāra language). We hope you put the ATS Tulu keyboard to good use.
Enable ATS Tulu Keyboard in Setting
Choose ATS Tulu Keyboard in Dialog
Pressing keys will play a sound
Please enable and choose ATS Tulu Keyboard
Thanks for using ATS Tulu Keyboard
